University of Utah ACM

Association of Computing Machinery, the largest educational and scientific computing society, delivers resources that advance computing as a science and a profession. The goal of our chapter is to aid in the development of skills and the network to allow students to take computing further...

Upcoming Events

  • Mock Interviews: Joint event hosted with SWE and Tau Beta Pi (click link for flyer).
  • Urails: Weekly meeting (see calendar).
  • CodePurpose: Weekly meeting (see calendar below for meeting times).
  • Want to add an event to our calendar? Contact us contributors get preference.

Events - Past and Present

  • Industry Tour - Adobe
  • Coding Competitions with Peter Jensen - Engage in competitve programming to forge your skills.
  • Why Did You Not Rage Quit? - Learn tips and tricks from seasoned CS students to overcome coding insanity.
  • Engineering Dinner - Meet with industry leaders to discuss challenges and opportunities over dinner.
  • Want something else? - Please share your idea by filling out this form.

Contributors

Are you interested in contributing to University of Utah's ACM chapter? We are always looking for partnerships please contact us.
